quotes: To a mind that is still, the entire universe surrenders.
The Truth is realized in an instant; the Act is practiced step by step.
Happiness must be grown in one's own garden.
an action committed in anger is an action doomed to failure.
Bloom where you are planted!
You have power over your mind ? not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
We are always complaining that our days are few, and acting as though there would be no end of them.
People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing - that's why we recommend it daily.
Only to the extent that we expose ourselves over and over to annihilation can that which is indestructible in us be found.
Some people feel the rain. Others just get wet.
Understanding that rests in what it does not understand is the finest.
We can choose to look at whatever we want.  We can look at what's wrong in our life or we can look at what's right.
You make your own luck if you stay at it long enough.
The path is difficult to ensure worthiness. The lazy look elsewhere, The persevering find riches.
Don't try to be young. Just open your mind. Stay interested in stuff.
For changes to be of any true value, they've got to be lasting and consistent.
When you know what you want, and want it bad enough, you will find a way to get it.
A clever person turns great troubles into little ones, and little ones into none at all.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
When you have to make a choice and don't make it, that is in itself a choice.
Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
Love yourself with the same intensity you would use to pull yourself up if you were hanging off a cliff.
Happiness is pretty simple: someone to love, something to do, something to look forward to.
Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win.
Empty your mind, be formless.
It's much better to do good in a way that no one knows anything about it.
The heart wants what it wants - or else it does not care.
It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
The quality of your life is the quality of your relationships.
I have never in my life learned anything from any man who agreed with me.
I don't ever give up. I'd have to be dead or completely incapacitated.
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create.
Our deeds determine us, as much as we determine our deeds.
If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
The wise accomplish all that they want without arousing the envy or scorn of others.
When you are talented you do it whatever it is until your fingers bleed or your eyes are ready to fall out of your head.
Circumstances do not make the man, they reveal him.
Surround yourself with people who take their work seriously, but not themselves, those who work hard and play hard.
Heal the past, live the present, dream the future.
You can easily judge the character of a man by how he treats those who can do nothing for him.
Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
It takes half your life before you discover life is a do-it-yourself project.
Imagination is more important than knowledge.
The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience and ability.
People acting together as a group can accomplish things which no individual acting alone could ever hope to bring about.
It's not the men in your life that matters, it's the life in your men.
Nothing makes a man broad-minded like adversity.
The goal is not to show how great you are to others, but how vulnerable you are to yourself.
